pr_title: [CALCITE-3817] VolcanoPlanner does not remove the entry in ruleNames when removing a rule

timeline.bodyText: No need to use LinkedHashMultimap because the key should be unique.
timeline.author: chunweilei

timeline.bodyText: It's interesting that this is only called during planner clean up phase. But I think it's still good to fix this.
